description: Defines the As Of Date to be used for any application effective dated data within the Workday system.  For "Find" operations, the "As Of Date" determines what data to be used within the search logic.  For "Get" operations, the response element will only include data that is the most effective as of the "As Of Date".

Defines the latest moment (e.g. datetime) data was entered into the Workday system.  For "Find" operations, the "As Of Moment" determines what data to be used within the search logic.  For "Get" operations, the response element will only include data entered into Workday before the "As Of Moment".

External_Integration_ID_Reference_Data.description: Display name inside the Workday system.

ID.description: Integration system identifier, part of a two part key (including the text value of the ID element) that uniquely identify integratable object.

validation.validation: Integration System ID does not exist.
validation.description: A valid instance of Integration ID must exist for the given System ID.

External_Integration_ID_Reference_Data.description: External ID that uniquely identifies the integratable object within the context of the integration system identified by the System ID attribute.

Employee_Reference.description: Integration ID reference is used as a unique identifier for integratable objects in the Workday system.

description: Reference element representing a unique instance of Employee.

validation.validation: Employee Reference Integration ID does not exist!
validation.description: A valid instance of Employee must exist for the given Integration ID Reference.
